item.description:
Beginners Welcome!!  Men, Women, Singles, Couples Doors open at 6:00 p.m.

Instructional Hour starts @6:15 p.m.** Courtesy Note:: Please be on time. Practice outside of class is expected and necessary.

Steppin'Practice 6:00 pm-8:30 pm.

**Certified Instruction provided by The Original Steppers of Boston Inc 2006 Team**

Full Bar!! We welcome you to stop by to get an idea of what Steppin' Chicago Style is all about.

There is a $10.00 participation fee to get on the dance floor, first visit is FREE.

We ask that you patronize the bar and tip the staff for their services..

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: The Den Class & Practice
